content:
I posted a request for a trivial demo, which may serve to arouse appropriate data lust in certain audiences.
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179160-social/topic/Trivial.20tutorial.20please/near/179570558

Gee whiz, that simple request erupted into a major thread with 83 zillion suggestions of things that I don't think would be of use to the ordinary consumer/patient/non-tech-newbie, but if you're interested in dissemination, have a look ... wow, but I'm confused!
